00036 require_once("include.inc.php");
00037 
00038 function parse_log ($log)
00039 {
00040   $log_a = array();
00041 
00042   foreach (preg_split("/\n/", $log, '-1', PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY) as $rule_line) {
00043     $items_a = preg_split("/\s+/", $rule_line, '-1', PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY);
00044     $data = array();
00045     $data['month'] = $items_a[0];
00046     $data['day'] = $items_a[1];
00047 //     $data['time'] = $items_a[2];
00048     $fulltime= explode('.', $items_a[2]);
00049     $data['time'] = $fulltime[0];
00050     preg_match('/[\d]+/', $items_a[4], $match);
00051     $data['rule'] = $match[0];
00052     $data['type'] = $items_a[5];
00053     $data['direction'] = $items_a[6];
00054     $data['interface'] = substr($items_a[8], 0, -1);
00055 
00056     if (preg_match('/[A-Z.]/', substr($items_a[12], 0, 1))) {
00057       $data['proto'] = "tcp";
00058       $data['flags'] = $items_a[12];
00059     } else if ($items_a[12] == "udp" || preg_match('/[0-9]/', substr($items_a[12], 0, 1))) {
00060       $data['proto'] = "udp";
00061     } else {
00062       $data['proto'] = substr($items_a[12], 0, -1);
00063     }
00064     if ($data['proto'] == "igmp-") {
00065       $data['proto'] = 'igmp';
00066     }
00067 
00068     if ($data['proto'] == "tcp" || $data['proto'] == "udp" || $data['proto'] == "v") {
00069       $data['source'] = substr($items_a[9], 0, strrpos($items_a[9], "."));
00070       $data['sourceport'] = substr($items_a[9], strrpos($items_a[9], ".") + 1);
00071       $data['destination'] = substr($items_a[11], 0, strrpos($items_a[11], "."));
00072       $data['destinationport'] = substr($items_a[11], strrpos($items_a[11], ".") + 1, -1);
00073     } else {
00074       $data['source'] = $items_a[9];
00075       $data['destination'] = substr($items_a[11], 0, -1);
00076     }
00077 
00078     if ($data['proto'] == "icmp") {
00079       $data['flags'] = $items_a[13]. " ". $items_a[14];
00080     }
00081 
00082     $log_a[] = $data;
00083   }
00084   return array_reverse($log_a);
00085 }
00086 
00087 function log_stats ($log_a)
00088 {
00089   $stats = array();
00090   foreach ($log_a as $log_entry) {
00091     if ($log_entry['proto'] == "tcp" || $log_entry['proto'] == "udp") {
00092       $stats['sourceport'][$log_entry['sourceport']] += 1;
00093       $stats['destinationport'][$log_entry['destinationport']] += 1;
00094     }
00095     $stats['destination'][$log_entry['destination']] += 1;
00096     $stats['source'][$log_entry['source']] += 1;
00097     $stats['proto'][$log_entry['proto']] += 1;
00098     $stats['type'][$log_entry['type']] += 1;
00099   }
00100   if (count($stats['sourceport'])) {
00101     arsort($stats['sourceport']);
00102   }
00103   if (count($stats['destinationport'])) {
00104     arsort($stats['destinationport']);
00105   }
00106   if (count($stats['destination'])) {
00107     arsort($stats['destination']);
00108   }
00109   if (count($stats['source'])) {
00110     arsort($stats['source']);
00111   }
00112   if (count($stats['proto'])) {
00113     arsort($stats['proto']);
00114   }
00115   if (count($stats['type'])) {
00116     arsort($stats['type']);
00117   }
00118   return $stats;
00119 }
00120 
00121 function get_host_by_address ($ip, $resolve = false)
00122 {
00123   global $dns_cache;
00124   
00125   if ($resolve) {
00126 
00127     if (!isset($dns_cache["$ip"])) {
00128       $dns_cache["$ip"] = gethostbyaddr($ip);
00129     }
00130     return $dns_cache[$ip];
00131   } else {
00132     return $ip;
00133   }
00134 }
00135 
00136 function get_service_by_port ($port, $proto = "tcp", $resolve = false)
00137 {
00138   global $service_cache;
00139   
00140   if ($resolve) {
00141     if (!isset($service_cache["$proto"]["$port"])) {
00142       $service = getservbyport($port, $proto);
00143       if ($service) {
00144         $service_cache["$proto"]["$port"] = $service;
00145       } else {
00146         $service_cache["$proto"]["$port"] = $port;
00147       }
00148     }
00149     return $service_cache["$proto"]["$port"];
00150   } else {
00151     return $port;
00152   }
00153 }
